synopsis.text:
Miyamae Kanako, an optimistic high school girl with an unusual allergy to boys, enrolls at the prestigious Ame no Kisaki all-girls academy in search of her destined female love. However, her quest takes an unexpected turn when she crosses paths with the captivating Mariya Shidou, who turns out to be a cross-dressing boy with a mischievous streak. As Kanako's new roommate, Mariya, along with his sharp-tongued maid Matsurika Shinouji, makes Kanako's life anything but easy.

Despite the numerous challenges, including navigating through a dorm filled with hidden traps and enduring Mariya's delicious yet diet-sabotaging snacks, Kanako remains undeterred in her pursuit of love. As she continues to grapple with Mariya's antics and the peculiarities of the academy, where trials for dog assaults and time-defying study rooms are the norm, one can only wonder if Kanako will ever find her one true love amidst the chaos.

Join Kanako and Mariya in their wild escapades at Ame no Kisaki, where the search for love is fraught with hilarious misadventures and unexpected revelations, making for an entertaining and engaging anime experience.
